name: dichondra
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a plant with white or greenish flowers that grows along the ground and is sometimes used instead of grass in warm regions: We decided to plant the dichondra in the front yard. The cat lay in a patch of thick green dichondra.
More examplesFewer examplesWe need to re-establish ground cover plantings in front of the house, using either dichondra or ice plant.Dichondra can be mowed and maintained like grass in warm regions.Dichondra is a broadleaf plant that produces an attractive, low, dense ground cover.
